row.entry: Three by three grid, all face up.
Center pile of the grid is to be built down, corners to be built up. Suit doesn't count.
Four piles on the grid that are not foundations. Each reserve can hold only one card at a time.

sect2.title: Goal
sect2.para: Move all cards of 6 or smaller to the center pile, 7 or greater to corner piles.

sect2.title: Rules
sect2.para: Click on the stock to flip over cards. Move one card at the time to the tableau. Once placed on a foundation pile, a card cannot be moved. Each corner pile is built up from 7 to king. Center pile is built down from 6 to ace. After ace comes another 6, etc. Suit doesn't count.

sect2.title: Options
sect2.para: Deal Three Cards: If you deal three cards at a time from the stock, you get to go through the deck three times.
Autoplay: If autoplay is activated, cards are automatically placed to foundation piles as soon as possible.

sect2.title: Scoring
sect2.para: Each card in the Foundation piles scores one point.

sect2.title: Strategy
sect2.para: Try to keep reserve. It's not easy to get Napoleon to his tomb, but keep trying.
